content: hey Deann crafters great to have you with me today we're going to make a
dilapidated lift for a sewer layer so kind of a cool fun quick easy project
so let's hit my table and make that dilapidated lift
hey guys it start my rickety lifts I'm gonna use this twine I got from the
dollar store really cheap twine and what I'm gonna do is just cut off a section I
just need to actually have four inch sections so I want to do a little longer
than that and I'm gonna soak it in the water just get it wet then I use my
white glue and go along the length of the twine because what I want to do is I
want to saturate this with glue so now I'll start rubbing it into the twine and
the goal is to get this a hard piece that I can use for the lift so I'll just
then twist that in and let it dry and just use my glue all now here's the lift
itself it's a three inch cardboard piece I've cut between the corrugations that
add a little bit of hot glue for detail now these are beads I'm going to use for
the to attach the rope to the lift and I've marked on the lid on the lift base
where I want the beads to go so I'll just glue that put it to have a hot glue
on there and I glue the pieces on there and it really doesn't matter what color
at this point and pull those strings off and let it harden up so there we go now
I've got my twine that's hardened up I'm going to trim the ends off so they're
flat and then I'll start gluing them in to the beads to make the the pulley for
the lid or the pool for the lift so I'll just Bend those in like a teepee because
they're gonna meet in the center and that'll be where the the lift rope
converges to for the lifts okay got those dried up now I've got a couple
more beads and I'm gonna use these for where the ropes converge into the
central rope so I've got three ropes there and I'm going to cut that off okay
so and you can see those there's nice still nice and stiff because I put the
glue on them and I'm gonna put this bead in the center there I'll just put some
hot glue just gonna pinch that together hot glue that bead on to the center and
see all the ropes go up into that one central point there and get that
hardened up and bent how how I want it and now glue the second bead to the top
because that'll be where the rope the main pulley rope meets the other ropes
okay so I've got that all connected with the hot glue and let that harden up for
a sec and now I've got the the rope for the
lift and it's 2 inches the other ropes are 4 inches okay so I'm gonna add this
to the top there and there we go we have our lift super easy alright now I spray
paint this black and I'm gonna use my technique of base painting it with a
dark burnt umber and this will give a nice undercoat under your color of dark
brown so as paint the whole thing the ropes and everything and once we could
that all paint it up we'll start adding some other colors so we let that dry up
now we're going to add a kind of a lighter moccasin Brown and we'll the dry
brush set on the planks of the lift and you can see how that detail is really
popping out a little bit I had a little bit of hot glue to those and gave a nice
rough detail and I'm gonna use some tan for the rope so I'll just paint the
ropes with that and that'll bring out the look of the ropes and I like how
raggedy they look from the twine it's pretty nice adds to the ambience of the
rickety lift so there we go paint up those ropes and now I'm an a Mississippi
mud and this is kind of a nice color it's it's in a sewer so it'll give it a
nice aged look as well as just kind of muck on it which I really like and so
I'll just add that there we go we've got the base coats on and now I need to do
some detail so I'm going to use my gunmetal to paint the joints where the
ropes meet and essentially covering the beads and just paint those all gunmetal
and I really like how those look it just really transformed transforms them from
beads to hardware on the lift now I'm going to use the burnt sienna that's a
little bit of a rust color and that'll give it a nice aged there we go we'll
look at the table oh there's Scotty and watch it all right
there we go let's hit the table our adventures are in the sewer and they
come across the rickety lifts and now they get to argue about who will be the
one that had to take the lift and so yeah I guess Roger got picked so
